channel.title: xElite- 24/7- It's all about Pking
channel.description:
[img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image1.jpg[/img] Note- Were a new server and keep in mind we were made 4 hours ago.
[img]http://06scape.com/favicon.ico[/img] [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play-o/xelite]Webclient[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/csQCx.png[/img] [url=http://xelitewebclient.webs.com/]Website[/url] ~Still in construction.
[b]What is xElite and what do we strive for?[/b] [i]xElite is a very friendly and nice community that brings Pking to a whole new level! We strive to pleasing the community and listen to they're suggestions are. [/i] [b]Why join xElite? Pk/Spawn/Eco[/b] [i]Well we have many good features such as: 24/7 16 GB Ram VPS. All special attacks fully working. Nex/Nomad, Newest cape (Tokhaar Kal) Perfect switches. 100% Pk point System Flawless Pking Pking Titles (Noob Pker - 10 kills - 1337 Pker 1000 Kills) Edgeville home Bridding like no where else New runescape Interfaces 562 Gameframe Wilderness Ditch working![/i] [b]Now to show you the Promo Video![/b] [img]http://youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XSjr08CIjGc&list=UUITxvulgee-ENSga6kpqDrQ&index=1&feature=plcp]Mini Promo Video[/url]
The red color code means the features have not been started yet. The orange color code means the feature has been started and it's on it's way of completion. The green color code means that the feature has been completed and added to the game.
Dungeoneering Newly updated armor Loyalty titles Armadyl, Zamarok, Bandos bosses Queen black dragon
Squeal of fortune New Runescape graphics Yell when someone has reached a 99 in a skill other then doing ::master 100% Pvp system Increased drop rates Lottery system
Flawless Pking New Tokhaar kal cape All special attack's working 100% All bugs and glitches fixed No dupes found anywhere in the server
[size=5]Media[/size] [size=5][img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image3.jpg[/img][/size] [img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image5.jpg[/img][img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image7.jpg[/img][img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image6.jpg[/img][img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image4.jpg[/img][img]http://i1065.photobucket.com/albums/u381/KanuGFX/Image2.jpg[/img]

item.title: xElite- 24/7- It's all about Pking
item.dc:creator: @xElite xElite
item.description:
@xElite wrote:


Note- Were a new server and keep in mind we were made 4 hours ago.

Webclient
Website ~Still in construction.

What is xElite and what do we strive for?
xElite is a very friendly and nice community that brings Pking to a whole new level! We strive to pleasing the community and listen to they’re suggestions are.

Why join xElite? Pk/Spawn/Eco
Well we have many good features such as:
24/7 16 GB Ram VPS.
All special attacks fully working.
Nex/Nomad,
Newest cape (Tokhaar Kal)
Perfect switches.
100% Pk point System
Flawless Pking
Pking Titles (Noob Pker - 10 kills - 1337 Pker 1000 Kills)
Edgeville home
Bridding like no where else
New runescape Interfaces
562 Gameframe
Wilderness Ditch working!
Now to show you the Promo Video!
Mini Promo Video

The red color code means the features have not been started yet.
The orange color code means the feature has been started and it’s on it’s way of completion.
The green color code means that the feature has been completed and added to the game.

Dungeoneering
Newly updated armor
Loyalty titles
Armadyl, Zamarok, Bandos bosses
Queen black dragon

Squeal of fortune
New Runescape graphics
Yell when someone has reached a 99 in a skill other then doing ::master
100% Pvp system
Increased drop rates
Lottery system

Flawless Pking
New Tokhaar kal cape
All special attack’s working 100%
All bugs and glitches fixed
No dupes found anywhere in the server
